name: Tinkerbell and the Great Fairy Rescue
name_original: Tinkerbell and the Great Fairy Rescue
description:
Tinkerbell and the Great Fairy Rescue is a casual game. It was originally released in 2010.
Tinkerbell and the Great Fairy Rescue is available on Nintendo DS.
It was produced by Helen Kalafatic and Margot Pipkin. It was directed by Bradley Raymond. It was scored by Joel McNeely.
